title: Four patients, two dialysis machines: Rationing medical care becomes a reality in hospitals overwhelmed with covid patients
content: Four patients, two dialysis machines: Rationing medical care becomes a reality in hospitals overwhelmed with covid patients  The Washington Post
contentSnippet: Four patients, two dialysis machines: Rationing medical care becomes a reality in hospitals overwhelmed with covid patients  The Washington Post

localize.title: 4人の患者、2台の透析装置。患者数の多い病院では、配給制の医療が現実のものとなっている。
四个病人，两台透析机。配给医疗服务在被癌症患者压得喘不过气来的医院成为现实
四個病人，兩臺透析機。配給醫療服務在被癌症患者壓得喘不過氣來的醫院成爲現實
